content.heading: The Pieces Make the Whole
content.text: I worked with the design team on a modular system that would allow our marketing to customize the posts and pages of the site.

content.heading: Atomic Design
content.text: Once the design was in place I built a reusable, atomic system of components. Each one had a series of classes and inputs that could allow a wide berth of customization. It was also safety-proofed so no matter what kind of configuration or content was injected, the site would maintain its branding and high quality of design.

content.heading: Integration and Hand-Off
content.text: I worked with an outside team to integrate my components into a custom WordPress template. Every level of the customization could then be done by the marketing team without them ever having to see a line of code.
